channel.title: Stopping nulls and SYI's?
channel.description: I tried that tutorial that stops them that you change a shit load of files, all it did was screw up my server (thank god for semi-backups). Im using Ddsspeced v2, and no there is no anti-null system, I get them all the time. Can someone help me?

item.title: Stopping nulls and SYI's?
item.dc:creator: @Thrasher_Alpha Thrasher Alpha
item.description:
@Thrasher_Alpha wrote:

[quote=“theUnforgiven, post:7, topic:253949”]You know you can get rid of the Syi and nulls easily if you just talk to the person who’s doing it . 50% of that stuff is stopped as soon as i talk to the guy and tell him if he doesnt leave in 10 seconds ill hack his hardrive and tell evreyone about the porn on it

Doing it manually is too much of a hassle i am proud owner of grimreaperscape. and on pandaxscape my previous server i finalyl actually stopped the nulls and syipkpkers and then something went wrong and my server got fucked up.

End of story.

SYippkpkers and nullstopers are extremely hard to find a good guide for.

Spend more time tryingt o ad things like gwars[/quote]

I might of just stopped it for good, if I get a connection from one IP 10 times in under a minute, that IP is banned, stops flooders, nulls, and syi, but there might be holes in that way.

Read full topic

item.title: Stopping nulls and SYI's?
item.dc:creator: @theUnforgiven theUnforgiven
item.description:
@theUnforgiven wrote:

You know you can get rid of the Syi and nulls easily if you just talk to the person who’s doing it . 50% of that stuff is stopped as soon as i talk to the guy and tell him if he doesnt leave in 10 seconds ill hack his hardrive and tell evreyone about the porn on it

Doing it manually is too much of a hassle i am proud owner of grimreaperscape. and on pandaxscape my previous server i finalyl actually stopped the nulls and syipkpkers and then something went wrong and my server got fucked up.

End of story.

SYippkpkers and nullstopers are extremely hard to find a good guide for.

Spend more time tryingt o ad things like gwars

item.title: Stopping nulls and SYI's?
item.dc:creator: @Thrasher_Alpha Thrasher Alpha
item.description:
@Thrasher_Alpha wrote:

[quote=“xx qwertyuiop xx, post:3, topic:253949”]Removing thread per client (made very easy) stops syi and all nulls
Try searching more thoroughly next time.[/quote]

Thats the tutorial I referred too in my first post. Fucked up my server.

Read full topic

item.title: Stopping nulls and SYI's?
item.dc:creator: @xx_qwertyuiop_xx xx qwertyuiop xx
item.description:
@xx_qwertyuiop_xx wrote:

Removing thread per client (made very easy) stops syi and all nulls
Try searching more thoroughly next time.

Read full topic

item.title: Stopping nulls and SYI's?
item.dc:creator: @r34p4g3pk r34p4g3pk
item.description:
@r34p4g3pk wrote:

You mean people nulling your server, you can just block SYI, have you tried doing that? I know that doesn’t always work as they can change the name of it, that’s the only way i know that can be the slightest thign to help you, sorry mate.

Read full topic
